    Viktor Zamaraev

    Lecturer
    Department of Computer Science
    University of Liverpool

    Contact

    Email: Viktor.Zamaraev@liverpool.ac.uk

    Publications

    Manuscripts

    1. Computing Maximum Matchings in Temporal Graphs
      (with Mertzios G.B., Molter H., Niedermeier R., Zschoche P.)
    2. Deleting edges to restrict the size of an epidemic in temporal networks
      (with Enright J., Meeks K., Mertzios G.B.)
    3. Distributed minimum vertex coloring and maximum independent set in chordal graphs
      (with Konrad C.)
    4. Graph classes with linear Ramsey numbers
      (with Alecu B., Atminas A., Lozin V.V.)
    5. How fast can we reach a target vertex in stochastic temporal graphs?
      (with Akrida E.C., Mertzios G.B., Nikoletseas S., Raptopoulos C., Spirakis P.G.)
    6. Linear Programming complementation and its application to fractional graph theory
      (with Gadouleau M., Mertzios G.B.)
    7. On the price of independence for vertex cover, feedback vertex set and odd cycle transversal
      (with Dabrowski K., Johnson M., Paesani G., Paulusma D.)
    8. Sliding Window Temporal Graph Coloring
      (with Mertzios G.B., Molter H.)

    Journal Publications

    1. Clique-width for graph classes closed under complementation
      SIAM Journal on Discrete Mathematics. (accepted) (with Blanché A., Dabrowski K., Johnson M., Lozin V.V., Paulusma D.)
    2. Independent domination versus weighted independent domination
      Information Processing Letters. 2020. Vol. 156. (with Lozin V.V., Malyshev D.S., Mosca R.)
    3. Letter graphs and geometric grid classes of permutations: characterization and recognition
      Discrete Applied Mathematics. (accepted) (with Alecu B., Lozin V.V., de Werra D.)
    4. Temporal vertex cover with a sliding time window
      Journal of Computer and System Sciences. 2020. Vol. 107. P. 108–123 (with Akrida E.C., Mertzios G.B., Spirakis P.G.)
    5. Dominating induced matchings in graphs containing no long claw
      Journal of Graph Theory. 2018. Vol. 88. No. 1. P. 18–39. (with Hertz A., Lozin V.V., Ries B., de Werra D.)
    6. Infinitely many minimal classes of graphs of unbounded clique-width
      Discrete Applied Mathematics. 2018. Vol. 248. P. 145–152. (with Collins A., Foniok J., Korpelainen N., Lozin V.V.)
    7. Linear read-once and related Boolean functions
      Discrete Applied Mathematics. 2018. Vol. 250. P. 16–27. (with Lozin V.V., Razgon I., Zamaraeva E., Zolotykh N.Yu.)
    8. On forbidden induced subgraphs for unit disk graphs
      Discrete & Computational Geometry. 2018. Vol. 60. No. 1. P. 57–97. (with Atminas A.)
    9. Upper Domination: towards a dichotomy through boundary properties
      Algorithmica. 2018. Vol. 80. No. 10. P. 2799–2817. (with AbouEisha H., Hussain S., Lozin V.V., Monnot J., Ries B.)
    10. Well-quasi-ordering versus clique-width
      Journal of Combinatorial Theory, Series B. 2018. Vol. 130. P. 1–18. (with Lozin V.V., Razgon I.)
    11. More results on weighted independent domination
      Theoretical Computer Science. 2017. Vol. 700. P. 63–74. (with Lozin V.V., Malyshev D.S., Mosca R.)
    12. The structure and the number of P7-free bipartite graphs
      European Journal of Combinatorics. 2017. Vol. 65. P. 143–153. (with Lozin V.V.)
    13. Combinatorics and algorithms for augmenting graphs
      Graphs and Combinatorics. 2016. Vol. 32. No. 4. P. 1339–1352. (with Dabrowski K., Lozin V.V., de Werra D.)
    14. A tolerance-based heuristic approach for the weighted independent set problem
      Journal of Combinatorial Optimization. 2015. Vol. 29. No. 2. P. 433–450. (with Malyshev D.S., Pardalos P.M., et al.)
    15. Boundary properties of factorial classes of graphs
      Journal of Graph Theory. 2015. Vol. 78. No. 3. P. 207–218. (with Lozin V.V.)
    16. Implicit representations and factorial properties of graphs
      Discrete Mathematics. 2015. Vol. 338. No. 2. P. 164–179. (with Atminas A., Collins A., Lozin V.V.)
    17. Measures of uncertainty in market network analysis
      Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications. 2014. Vol. 413. No. 1. P. 59–70. (with Kalyagin V.A., Koldanov A.P., Koldanov P.A., Pardalos P.M.)
    18. On factorial subclasses of claw-free graphs
      Discrete Anal. Oper. Res.. 2013. Vol. 20. No. 6. P. 30–39. (In Russian)
    19. Locally bounded coverings and factorial properties of graphs
      European Journal of Combinatorics. 2012. Vol. 33. No. 4. P. 534–543. (with Lozin V.V., Mayhill C.)
    20. On factorial properties of chordal bipartite graphs
      Discrete Mathematics. 2012. Vol. 312. No. 16. P. 2457–2465. (with Dabrowski K., Lozin V.V.)
    21. A note on the speed of hereditary graph properties
      Electronic Journal of Combinatorics. 2011. Vol. 18. No. 1. P. 1–14. (with Lozin V.V., Mayhill C.)
    22. Almost all factorial subclasses of quasi-line graphs with respect to one forbidden subgraph
      Moscow Journal of Combinatorics and Number Theory. 2011. Vol. 1. No. 3. P. 277–286.
    23. On estimation of the number of graphs in some hereditary classes
      Diskretn. Mat.. 2011. Vol. 23. No. 3. P. 57–62. (In Russian)
